## Description {#details}

This class represents the scheduled code.

The main data structure is a map from scheduled cycle to instructions. During scheduling, the data structure explicitly represents all stages/iterations. When the algorithm finshes, the schedule is collapsed into a single stage, which represents instructions from different loop iterations.

The SMS algorithm allows negative values for cycles, so the first cycle in the schedule is the smallest cycle value.

Definition at line 670 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinepipeliner-h">MachinePipeliner.h</a>.

### finalizeSchedule() {#aff7649124c08f77b72e5d539f2f8afdf}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void SMSchedule::finalizeSchedule (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerdag">SwingSchedulerDAG</a> &#42; SSD)</>}>
After the schedule has been formed, call this function to combine the instructions from the different stages/cycles.

That is, this function creates a schedule that represents a single iteration.

### insert() {#a2eff58d9105525f19d5cbe2fa6969d6e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool SMSchedule::insert (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42; SU, int StartCycle, int EndCycle, int II)</>}>
Try to schedule the node at the specified StartCycle and continue until the node is schedule or the EndCycle is reached.

This function returns true if the node is scheduled. This routine may search either forward or backward for a place to insert the instruction based upon the relative values of StartCycle and EndCycle.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinepipeliner-h/#l00737">737</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinepipeliner-h">MachinePipeliner.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinepipeliner-cpp/#l02774">2774</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinepipeliner-cpp">MachinePipeliner.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### isLoopCarriedDefOfUse() {#ab34a636a3a33052e76df78342c72627e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool SMSchedule::isLoopCarriedDefOfUse (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerdag">SwingSchedulerDAG</a> &#42; SSD, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; Def, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp; MO) const</>}>
Return true if the instruction is a definition that is loop carried and defines the use on the next iteration.

v1 = phi(v2, v3) (Def) v3 = op v1 (MO) = v1 If MO appears before Def, then v1 and v3 may get assigned to the same register.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinepipeliner-h/#l00792">792</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinepipeliner-h">MachinePipeliner.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinepipeliner-cpp/#l03085">3085</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinepipeliner-cpp">MachinePipeliner.cpp</a>.
